name: Denki Gaka's Bombshell
description: A fast-paced minesweeper game in 3D with classic and arcade style game play!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: Pentium 4 or higher Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 600 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
